attr.name: Values
attr.content: none | <url> | [ [ inset() | circle() | ellipse() | polygon() ] â€– [ borderbox | padding-box | content-box | margin-box | fill-box | strokebox | view-box ] ]

attr.name: Applies to
attr.content: All elements (in SVG, applies to all graphics elements and all container elements except the <defs>element)

attr.name: Animatable
attr.content: Yes for inset(), circle(), ellipse(), and polygon()
